about_the_game:
Summary: Wiccatrix is a 3D Action RPG. Gameplay is designed for a XBox style controller or Keyboard.
The game is inspired by old 80's 90's Role Playing Games such as Legend (aka Four Crystals of Trazere), The original Rogue, Gauntlet (Atari Arcade) & Ultima 8 Pagan + others games like World Of Warcraft etc... Wiccatrix consists of designed scenes and randomly generated dungeons for crawling through, killing mobs and getting loot.
The game will also have other RPG aspects such as free roaming scenes with NPC’s and:~
  • Spellcrafting ~ A spell crafting system that uses a combination of herbs and runes to enable the player to create their own spells!!
  • Dialogue & a Story line ~ A rogue titan is disturbing the elemental balance which permeates the world of Terra. The players role is to guide the our hero Catsear the peasant through a world filled with enemies and other characters and ultimately a final encounter with a rogue elemental titan that seeks to destroy the world. Can he be banished? It won't be easy.
  • Puzzles ~ Use spells and your own wit to defeat puzzles and receive rewards and gain access to dungeons areas..
  • Combat ~ Go into battle with your limited melee abilities and your spells or run away screaming like a little chicken from mobs of enemies and bosses of various types. Getting into fights and not dying will challenge the player’s ability. Sometimes this will be easy and other times it will be near impossible and require a different approach. The player will have the experience of building their skills to withstand a progressively increasing horde of enemies with harder and more damaging attacks.
  • Loot and Reagent (Spell Ingredients) Gathering ~ Loot and Reagents can be bought from merchants, found in parts of the world or received from enemy drops and quests.

Release ~ Aiming for November 2024 or not long after ~ That's the plan..

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or better
  • Processor: Intel core i5-4570 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard will do..
  • Additional Notes: Developed on a PC built about 10 years ago..

short_description: Wiccatrix is an ARPG with a spellcrafting system that allows the player to create custom spells to use in combat and to solve puzzles. The elemental balance or the world of Terra has been disturbed. Your goal is to explore the lands of Terra and help restore the elemental order back to harmony.
